short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds time slots on When2Meet that intersect the selected guests' availability.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When2Meet is an amazing tool to help easily coordinate a time that works for the most people. But what about when you need to find a time that works for specific guests? The When2Meet Intersector finds the intersection of the guests you select and clearly marks on the calendar when they can meet. 

You can select how long your meetings are and how much of that meeting you'd like your guests to be available for. For example, scheduling a 1-hour meeting may be difficult with 10 people, but you can find a block of 60 minutes during which everyone can come for at least 30 minutes.
